lead_paragraph: He received 46 months for giving classified information to a Malaysian defense contractor in exchange for hotel stays and the services of prostitutes.

headline.print_headline: California: Navy Captain Gets Prison for Bribery
headline.main: California: Navy Captain Gets Prison in Bribery Case

snippet: He received 46 months for giving classified information to a Malaysian defense contractor in exchange for hotel stays and the services of prostitutes.
abstract: Federal judge sentences Navy Capt Daniel Dusek to 46 months in prison for giving classified information to Glenn Defense Marine Asia Ltd, Malaysian contractor in exchange for gifts and time with prostitutes.
